Row.Text: The Finnish nation welcomes you. I am baron Gustaf Mannerheim, the honored marshal and leader of Finland. The night is beautiful and solemn, so let's not ruin it with meaningless hostilities.

Breathe the air of our lakelands, feel the peace of this untouched wilderness. This is Finland, and its people is honored by your presence, great leader. I am baron Gustaf Mannerheim, the marshal and regent of Finland.
Finland has fallen, but our heritage will shine forever.
Stop wasting my time if you don't have anything sensible to say.
Accepting such a deal would be treason to the nation of Finland.
Make it quick. Finland has no time for likes of you.
Great leader, what may Finland do for its friend?
Finland has no desire to aid you with your pathetic war effort, if that's what you want.
Finland wishes the best for your people in these dangerous and stormy times.
For your information, the continuing mobilisation of your army near our borders will cause serious consequences.
Your continuing expansion is upsetting the Finnish people. For you to know, it will eventually cause your downfall.
We were just discussing about your continuing expansion. You should take that as a warning.
Your continuing expansion is upsetting the Finnish people. For you to know, it will eventually cause your downfall.
We were just discussing about your continuing expansion. You should take that as a warning.
We are proud to have an ally with such a powerful military as yours.
You're empire is famous for its strong economy. I hope it goes to the good of your people.
As a friend, I would say you are my favourite city-state. But as we're not friends, I can't really say 'favourite'.
Your army is so pathetic I hope someone will put it down from its misery soon.
Finland will have no business with likes of you.
Sorry. As we met so little time ago, I would prefer a more neutral approach to our diplomacy.

I want you to know that not Finland, nor the world will tolerate your actions. Take that as a warning. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]([COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]They have publicly denounced us! NOTE: You are not at war.[ENDCOLOR])

I announce the world Finland has no business with likes of you. Don't tell me you didn't see this coming.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]([COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]They have publicly denounced us! NOTE: You are not at war.[ENDCOLOR])
Finland has done you no wrong, and deserves nothing of this sort.
I am pleased to hear of your friendship with {1_CivName}, as they are great friends of Finland.
Getting too close to {1_CivName} will severely damage our diplomatic relations, for you to know.
I strongly urge you to reconsider your position with {1_CivName}. They have been nothing but good friends to me.
Finland agrees with you that {1_CivName} is not to be trusted.
We noticed your alliance with {1_CivName}, and Finland is not afraid to follow you to this alliance.
Oh great, now the vermin are breeding. Now I have to deal with both you and {1_CivName}?
I share your convictions that {1_CivName} only causes problems for our cause. Perhaps the combination of our denouncements will have them rethink their actions.
Our best interests would be making a declaration of friendship between our two countries.
Great leader, would your nation like to make a declaration of friendship with Finland?
Finland will not tolerate your military build-up at its most sacred borders.
I am concerned about your growing expansion, and must warn you against it.
Your continuing expansion is upsetting the Finnish people. For you to know, it will eventually cause your downfall.
Your continuing expansion is upsetting the Finnish people. For you to know, it will eventually cause your downfall.
I am concerned about your growing expansion, and must warn you against it.
Finland will never forget your merciful actions towards our civilians.
{2_MajorCivName:textkey} announces to the world that it is now protecting {1_MinorCivName:textkey}. Attacking the City-State will greatly damage relations and may lead to war.
{2_MajorCivName:textkey} has taken back its guarantee of protecting {1_MinorCivName:textkey}.
Finland respectfully declines to oblige your concerns.
I understand your concerns. I will see to it that this case will be settled in the parliament.
I sincerely hope that through trade our two nations will prosper.
As a sign of mutual respect, Finland would be willing to open her borders if you are willing to do the same.
Would you be willing to assist us in these dark times? Finland would be indebted to your great nation.
There will be war, but you shall not see our nation succumbed. We will fight for our home, religion and fatherland!
Very well. A maelstrom of death shall envelope us both.
Finland shall never surrender.
God will never forgive your actions of betrayal. This will eventually lead to your downfall.
Finland seeks justice, not peace.
This is quite disappointing to hear.
You have our thanks.
